trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) stares at you with [hH](?:is|er) silvery eyes\.$
trigger.name: transmology_eyes_hypnotize__

trigger.match: ^A swirling beam of light shoots out of the eye of a floating spix directly into your eyes\, transfixing you with a kaleidoscope of colours and shapes\.$
trigger.name: transmology_spix_transfix__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) throws back [hH](?:is|er) head and blows a stream of slime out of [hH](?:is|er) nose and onto you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_nose_slime__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) darts out and viciously pecks you with [hH](?:is|er) beak nose\.$
trigger.name: transmology_nose_peck__

trigger.match: ^A squirming sludgeworm rears up and spits a gob of green slime onto you\, covering you in a slick muco?us\.$
trigger.name: transmology_sludgeworm__

trigger.match: ^A puddle of slimy muco?us forms under your feet\, causing you to slip and fall\.$
trigger.name: transmology_sludgeworm_fall__

trigger.match: ^The slithering tentacles sprouting from ([A-Z][a-z]+) wrap around you and then snap off of [hH](?:im|er)\, entangling you like bloody ropes\.$
trigger.name: transmology_torso_block__

trigger.match: ^A screeching morrible places a suckered finger against the nape of your neck\. Your mind reels as dozens of gibbering voices assault you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_morrible__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) rakes you across the throat with [hH](?:is|er) claws\.$
trigger.name: transmology_hands_claw__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) slugs you in the jaw with [hH](?:is|er) enormous fist\.$
trigger.name: transmology_hands_crush__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) screams at you\, \"[^a-z]+\!\"$
trigger.name: transmology_throat_scream__

trigger.match: ^An enormous gutt[eu]ral croak reverberates through the air\, shaking the ground\.$
trigger.name: transmology_throat_croak__

trigger.match: ^The grotesque sound causes your insides to churn and you taste blood in your mouth\.$
trigger.name: transmology_throat_croaked__

trigger.match: ^Dozens of hands from a tangled hekoskeri slap at you\, and you feel a cold needle injected into your shoulder\, causing your reactions to slow\.$
trigger.name: transmology_hekoskeri__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) sinks [hH](?:is|er) fangs into your neck\, and you feel yourself drained of blood and energy.$
trigger.name: transmology_mouth_bite__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) whispers into [hH](?:is|er) cupped hands\,? and then releases a fluttering madfly\,? which buzzes over to you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_madfly__

trigger.match: ^A fluttering madfly darts into your ear\, and you hear a horrendously loud buzzing within your skull\. You stumble about trying to clear the impossible visions that plague you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_madfly_insanity__

trigger.match: ^A fluttering madfly curls up and turns black\, disintegrating into dust\.$
trigger.name: transmology_madfly_gone__

trigger.match: ^The psychedelic lights around ([A-Z][a-z]+) flare and shoot out at you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_aura_psychedelia__

trigger.match: ^Reality shifts and colours explode in your vision as the Inveiglora of Gnostoratu points a dainty finger at you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_champion_mob1__

trigger.match: ^Laughing softly\, the Inveiglora of Gnostoratu whips her arms at you\, which transform into a mass of tentacles that binds you completely\.$
trigger.name: transmology_champion_mob2__

trigger.match: ^The Inveiglora of Gnostoratu giggles as her hand seizes your throat\, her fingers morphing into tentacles that only tighten their hold\.$
trigger.name: transmology_champion_mob3__

trigger.match: ^You feel your mental strength drain as the Inveiglora of Gnostoratu's throat splits open and releases a discordant song\.$
trigger.name: transmology_champion_mob4__

trigger.match: ^H(?:is|er) eyes glowing a fearsome yellow\, a homunculus resembling a deformed \w+ stares at you with a burning gaze\, and you cannot help but shudder at the intensity of the malice directed towards you\.$
trigger.name: transmology_homunculus1__

trigger.match: ^Baring sharpened teeth dripping with greenish saliva\, a homunculus resembling a deformed \w+ leaps up and bites you\, causing you to tremble and feel feverish\.$
trigger.name: transmology_homunculus2__

trigger.match: ^H(?:is|er) eyes glowing a fiery red\, a homunculus resembling a deformed \w+ looks at you\, quickly looks away\, then looks back at you with a malicious glint in [hH](?:is|er) eye\.$
trigger.name: transmology_homunculus3__

trigger.match: ^A hauntingly beautiful song fills the air\, compelling you to follow it\.$
trigger.name: transmology_throat_sing1__

trigger.match: ^As the song reaches a crescendo\, you cannot help but follow it to its source\.$
trigger.name: transmology_throat_sing2__
